greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Partial sums of A030301.
link: Kevin Ryde, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
formula: a(n) = (n - 1 - (2/3)*(4^e_4-1) - (-1)^e_2*(n - 1 - 2*(4^e_4-1)))/2 where e_4 = floor(log_4(n)) and e_2 = floor(log_2(n)) = floor(log_4(n^2)). - Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)hotmail.com), Feb 22 2003
a(n) = n - A079947(n). Let k=A000523(n), then a(n) = A000975(k) if k even, or a(n) = n - A000975(k) if k odd. - _Kevin Ryde_, Jul 23 2019
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(k=logint(n,2), p=(2<<k)\3); if(bittest(k,0), n-p, p); /* _Kevin Ryde_, Jul 23 2019 */
(MAGMA) [&+[Floor(Log(k)/Log(2)) mod 2:k in [1..n]]:n in [1..75]]; // _Marius A. Burtea_, Oct 25 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 22 2003
